title: Con Edison Wins 2015 ReliabilityOne™ Award For Outstanding System-Wide Reliability (Consolidated Edison Company of New ...
text: ( Source : Consolidated Edison Company of New York Inc) NEW YORK - Con Edison has been named winner of the 2015 ReliabilityOne™ Award for Outstanding System-Wide Reliability for the eighth year in a row. Celebrating its 15th anniversary,
